data.eml:eml: Trachelostenini sensu novo: redescriptions of Trachelostenus Solier, Myrmecodema Gebien and Leaus Matthews & Lawrence, based on adults and larvae, and descriptions of three new species of Leaus (Coleoptera: Tenebrionidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Matthews, Eric G., Lawrence, John F. (2015): Trachelostenini sensu novo: redescriptions of Trachelostenus Solier, Myrmecodema Gebien and Leaus Matthews & Lawrence, based on adults and larvae, and descriptions of three new species of Leaus (Coleoptera: Tenebrionidae). Zootaxa 4020 (2): 289-312, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4020.2.4
